title: Time Traveler

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Rewind: Once per game night, the Time Traveler can choose to "rewind" time, allowing them to revisit the events of a previous night. This ability allows them to see who visited a specific player and what actions were taken that night.
- Temporal Vision: The Time Traveler can use their temporal vision to identify any players who have been affected by time-altering roles. This includes players who have been transported, role-blocked, or otherwise manipulated during the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The Time Traveler is immune to role-block and transport abilities.
- If the Time Traveler is attacked during a night when they use the "Rewind" ability, they will not be affected by the attack.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak faction**__ because im lazy i promise ill never do it again

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: The Time Traveler's goal is to assist the Town in identifying and eliminating the Mafia, Coven, Serial Killers, and other evil roles. They win with the Town.

desc:
